Description

Provides generic CRUD operations for JPA entities via an EntityManager.

JSF controller for admins to create, edit, and delete Customer entities.

Represents an insurance agent entity with associated user and policies.

JSF controller allowing agents to create, view, edit, and delete insurance policies.

Handles business operations for Agent entities, including policy management.

Represents an insurance claim with amount, date and linked policy.
ClaimService
Provides CRUD operations for Claim entities.
Customer
Represents a customer with personal details and their insurance policies.
CustomerController
JSF controller to handle customer account creation and policy navigation.
CustomerConverter
Converts Customer entities to and from String representations in JSF.
CustomerService
Handles Customer operations, including fetching by username with policies.
DatabaseInitializer
Initializes the database with sample groups, users, agents, customers and policies at startup.
Group
Represents a security group entity for role-based authorization.
GroupService
Provides CRUD operations for security Group entities.
HashTheUserPasswordListener
Hashes user passwords before persisting or updating User entities.

Represents an insurance policy with coverage, dates, type, and relationships.
InsurancePolicyService
Provides CRUD operations for InsurancePolicy entities.

Defines the JDBC DataSource for the application.

Configures Jakarta Security for authentication and role declarations.

Provides a simple REST endpoint for testing Jakarta EE functionality.
JakartaRestConfiguration
Configures Jakarta RESTful Web Services for the application.
LocalDateConverter
Converts LocalDate objects to and from String for JSF forms.
LoginController
JSF controller handling user login authentication and role-based navigation.
PolicyType
Defines the PolicyType enumeration for insurance policy categories.
User
Represents a system user with credentials and associated security groups.
UserService
Provides CRUD operations for User entities, including retrieval of all users.
